Text.val: 20.12.2013 JH SCR18565 Added BADT_IBAN to the Ledger Bookings screen
05.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
12.01.2010 GB SCR15231 Extended condition for selection
02.05.2006 AK SCR10924 added PI.MQDT_HOFF_CODE and PI.MQDT_HSUBGRP_CODE
23.11.2005 SH SCR9566 Added BDTL_BANKACCOUNT to tabular view "LedgerBookings"
14.11.2005 SH SCR9495 Added LGCD_ADMNO to tabular view "LedgerBookings"
06.10.2005 SH SCR9182 Changed tabular view of LGCD rows from distinct
08.08.2005 SH SCR8763 Changed permission for button "Delete"

SQL_STMT_U.val: select LGCD_LDGR_NO, LGCD_ADMNO, BDTL_BANKACCOUNT, LGCD_AMOUNTDEBITH, LGCD_AMOUNTCREDITH, BADT_IBAN from :1/lgcd, :1/bdtl, :1/badt where LGCD_LGCH_ID = BDTL_LGCH_ID and BADT_BANK_ADMNO = :2 and BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO = :3 and BADT_HANDLINGDATE = ':4' and BDTL_BANK_ADMNO = BADT_BANK_ADMNO and BDTL_BANK_LEDG_NO = BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO and BDTL_BANKID = BADT_BANKID and BDTL_BANKACCOUNT = BADT_BANKACCOUNT and BDTL_DATDAILYSTATEMENT = BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT and BDTL_DAILYRUNNUMBER = BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER order by LGCD_LDGR_NO for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
